activities_info.details: Hospital Food Delivery: Our Medical Student Association has been buying healthy snacks and coordinating purchasing and drop off to different units (IM floor, ED, Physician's Lounge, ICU, etc.) of Bozeman Deaconess Hospital, which serves the county with the highest number of cases in MT.
Grocery Shopping: Looking for volunteers around the Bozeman, Missoula, and Billings areas to run errands and go grocery shopping for individuals considered high-risk for COVID-19 infection.

Telephone Screening: Working with Gallatin County Public Health to host trainings for medical students to allow them to perform telehealth screening and free up local primary care providers. One training was held mid-March, and another is ideally in the works in the coming weeks.
